mapper.select: select dm_no as dmNo, sender, receiver, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as dmDate, read_check as readCheck from direct_message where dm_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: update direct_message set read_check=1 where dm_no=#{_parameter}
mapper.select: select count(*) from direct_message where receiver = #{_parameter} and read_check=0
